original_text: And when Zebul the ruler of the city heard the words of Gaal the son of Ebed, his anger was kindled.
korean_text: 그 성읍의 방백 스불이 에벳의 아들 가알의 말을 듣고 노하여

sentences.original_text: And when Zebul the ruler of the city heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성의 통치자 스불이 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: the words of Gaal the son of Ebed
